name: Dottie's Burger Scramble Florentine
ingredients: 1 1/2 ounces onion, chopped (about 1/2 a small onion)
10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and well-drained
8 ounces cream cheese, softened and cubed

instructions.en: Spray a 2-quart casserole dish with non-stick spray.
instructions.sk: Postriekajte 2-litrovú zapekaciu misu sprejom proti prilepeniu.
instructions.ja: 2クォートのキャセロール皿にノンスティックスプレーを吹きかけます。

instructions.en: Brown ground beef and onion (and optional garlic) in a large pot; drain fat.
instructions.sk: Opečte mleté mäso a cibuľu (a voliteľne cesnak) vo veľkom hrnci; zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きな鍋で挽肉と玉ねぎ（オプションでニンニク）を炒めて茶色くし、脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in spinach, salt, pepper, and optional garlic powder until well combined.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte špenát, soľ, korenie a voliteľne cesnakový prášok, kým sa dobre nespoja.
instructions.ja: ほうれん草、塩、コショウ、オプションのニンニクパウダーを加えてよく混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Add cubed cream cheese, stirring and mashing until blended with the meat mixture.
instructions.sk: Pridajte nakrájaný krémový syr, miešajte a roztlačte, kým sa nespojí s mäsovou zmesou.
instructions.ja: 角切りのクリームチーズを加え、肉の混ぜ物とよく混ざるまで混ぜてつぶします。

instructions.en: Stir in parmesan cheese and heavy cream; mix well.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte parmezán a smotanu na šľahanie; dobre premiešajte.
instructions.ja: パルメザンチーズと生クリームを加えてよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Pour into casserole dish. Bake uncovered at 350°F for 30-35 minutes, until bubbly and browned.
instructions.sk: Nalejte do zapekacej misy. Pečte nezakryté pri 175°C 30-35 minút, kým nebude bublajúce a zhnednuté.
instructions.ja: キャセロール皿に注ぎます。350°F（175°C）のオーブンで30〜35分間、泡立ち茶色くなるまで蓋をせずに焼きます。

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Can be frozen. Optional garlic and garlic powder not included in nutritional counts.
